id: They responded to a mass shooting, then fought wildfires hours later
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Darran Simon, CNNUpdated 6:54 PM ET, Mon November 12, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Last week, firefighters in southern California raced to save the lives of victims of a mass shooting. Just hours later, they sped off to battle two wildfires, several miles apart.CNN' Holly Yan and Susannah Cullinane contributed to this report.
